# cornerRadius

**Instance Property**

The radius of the receiver’s corners when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var cornerRadius: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The receiver’s corner radius. It must be a custom box—that is, it has a type of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBox/BoxType-swift.enum/custom]—and it must have a border style of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBorderType/lineBorder].

### Special Considerations

Functional only when the receiver’s box type ([doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBox/boxType-swift.property]) is `NSBoxCustom` and its border type ([doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBox/borderType]) is `NSLineBorder`.

## Customizing

- **borderColor**: The color of the receiver’s border when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.
- **borderWidth**: The width of the receiver’s border when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.
- **fillColor**: The color of the receiver’s background when the receiver is a custom box with a simple line border.
